portfolio.description: Explore my recent projects showcasing modern web development with clean code and great user experience.

featured.title: FreediveAnalyzer
featured.subtitle: Personal Project – Full Stack App (2024)
featured.description: FreediveAnalyzer is a full-stack web platform for logging and analyzing freediving sessions, designed with scalability and modularity in mind. Built with a React SPA frontend and a Laravel RESTful API backend, it supports multilingual interfaces (i18next), secure JWT-based authentication (email/password and Google OAuth), and real-time data visualization via Recharts. The system enables manual and bulk dive imports (.xml/.sml), tracks dive metrics, and delivers performance insights through dynamic charts and oxygen recovery ratios. Deployed with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub + Docker + Vercel), integrated with PostgreSQL, and optimized for cross-device responsiveness.

penyes.title: PenyesAPP
penyes.subtitle: Academic Project – Full Stack Platform (2025)
penyes.description: Web platform designed for managing local festival groups ('peñas'), enabling administrators to oversee users, peñas, payments, and fair draw systems, while users can join groups, manage their profile, and track payments. Includes role-based access, a dynamic cadafal draw implemented in React, and an integrated wallet for fee management.

recommendation.paragraph1: "During her training at our center, Olena has proven to be an exemplary student, with a proactive attitude, great learning ability, and a strong commitment to her professional development.
recommendation.paragraph2: She stands out for her curiosity, her ability to solve problems independently, and her genuine interest in programming and software development. Not only has she achieved excellent academic results —including graduating with honors— but she has also demonstrated exceptional skills in teamwork and taking on responsibilities.
recommendation.paragraph3: I am confident that Olena will bring great value to any project or team she joins."
